name: CandidateBot

description: Bingo game to play while watching debates based on phrases they should say

description: Provide instructions for ppl who want to Fundraise to go to battleground states

description: Free rides to and from the polls on election day.

description: Find events and volunteer opportunities with the Clinton campaign in your area
